channel.title: ReadShort and writeShort
channel.description:
Does anyone have the readShort method for a 317 client and the writeShort method for a [pi] 317 server?
My stream class(client) doesn't have the method readShort and my stream class(server) doesn't have the writeShort method

item.title: ReadShort and writeShort
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Stay on topic, please.
Good luck with your issue.

Read full topic

item.title: ReadShort and writeShort
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Of course his server has a read/writeShort method, it is named differently in winterLove based servers, the stream class was renamed horrendously. The naming is read/writeWord

oh yeah i havent used wL in awhile so it slipped my mind

shouldn’t have been so rude about it, sorry

Read full topic

item.title: ReadShort and writeShort
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:533530”]why would you make a thread for this…

download any PI and rip a Stream class[/quote]

Of course his server has a read/writeShort method, it is named differently in winterLove based servers, the stream class was renamed horrendously. The naming is read/writeWord

Read full topic
